alert.note: Alert for Coastal Camden; Coastal Glynn; Inland Camden; Inland Glynn (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 11 at 4:08PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Camden and Glynn Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 408 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles southwest of Waverly to 7 miles northeast of Woodbine to 10 miles northeast of Kings Bay Base. Movement was north at 30 mph. This storm was producing a strong gust front. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Brunswick, St. Simons Island, Woodbine, Dock Junction, Country Club Estates, Waverly, Thalmann, Sea Island, Jekyll Island and Dover Bluff. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Camden; Coastal Glynn; Inland Camden; Inland Glynn
